#> 234                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              genotype: flb somatic variant - developmental stage name: Flower(3-replications);  genotype: flb somatic variant - developmental stage name: 8 DAA fruit(3-replications);  genotype: Wild type Ugni Blanc - developmental stage name: Flower(3-replications);  genotype: Wild type Ugni Blanc - developmental stage name: 8 DAA fruit(3-replications)
#> 235                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In the field, only irrigation was used as treatments, thus two treatments were applied: Full irrigated (control) and non irrigated (stress). Irrigation water was applied with drip emitters (4.0 L h-1 for FI) two per vine, positioned 30 cm from the vine trunk. The water was supplied according to the crop\xe2\xac"s evapotranspiration (ETc). Samples were taken when the pre dawn leaf water potential was circa -0.7MPa in the NI plants and higher than -0.2MPa in the FI plants. To assess physiological effects of stress treatments: Individual stresses were applied when shoots were 50 to 60 cm high (after circa four months growth). The stresses applied were: W (Water)\xe2\xac\034 stop irrigation until the pre-dawn leaf water potential (Ψw) was -0.9 MPa; L (Light) \xe2\xac\034 1 hour at 2000µmolm2s-1; H (Heat) \xe2\xac\034 1 hour at 42ºC

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         In the field, only irrigation was used as treatments, thus two treatments were applied: Full irrigated (control) and non irrigated (stress). Irrigation water was applied with drip emitters (4.0 L h-1 for FI) two per vine, positioned 30 cm from the vine trunk. The water was supplied according to the crop\xe2\xac"s evapotranspiration (ETc). Samples were taken when the pre dawn leaf water potential was circa -0.7MPa in the NI plants and higher than -0.2MPa in the FI plants. To assess physiological effects of stress treatments: Individual stresses were applied when shoots were 50 to 60 cm high (after circa four months growth). The stresses applied were: W (Water)\xe2\xac\034 stop irrigation until the pre-dawn leaf water potential (Ψw) was -0.9 MPa; L (Light) \xe2\xac\034 1 hour at 2000µmolm2s-1; H (Heat) \xe2\xac\034 1 hour at 42ºC
#> 252
